job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Site Reliability Engineer / Sr DevOps Engineer<br>Location – Seattle, WA – Remote OK<br>Duration – 12 months<br>Required:<br>• Bachelor's degree in CS or a related STEM engineering field strongly preferred<br>• Relevant certifications are a plus<br>• 8-10+ years of Site Reliability / DevOps Engineering<br>• Expertise in AWS / Azure<br>• Expertise in Kubernetes, kOps, & Helm 3.<br>• Istio service mesh experience is strongly preferred.<br>• •Experience with Infrastructure as Code IIAC) required.<br>• Specifically we are looking for Terraform<br>• Fluency in at least one language required: Python, C#, JAVA. Should have strong API experience.<br>• Experience working in SOA and 12 factor app methodology<br>• Strong leadership, initiative taking, and capacity for decision making<br>• Expert knowledge in any or all of these is a huge plus: Prometheus Operator, Grafana, Loki, ELK Stack, OpenTelemetry, Jaeger/OpenTracing<br>• Participate in the on-call rotation<br><br>What You'll Do<br>• Work across teams to completely automate everything we do<br>• Drive and own best practices with automation, be passionate and proactive<br>• Approach alerting, monitoring, and log aggregation with an eye toward flexibility and insight-driven metrics<br>• Collaborate with the teams to ensure ongoing infrastructure management/automation (IAC), CI/CD pipeline construction in collaboration with the Release Engineering team, monitoring, and maintenance<br>• Enable our engineering teams to deliver high quality software, fast, well tested, in a highly repeatable way<br>• Create automated tool sets to deploy, measure, solidify and observe our infrastructure <br>• Ongoing study and implementation of the industry's latest best practices and drive those within the company<br>• Participate in the on-call rotation<br><br>
